analyzed: gang gi phyir bya ba byed pa la yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dir yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the word existence here is that which exists in performing the action.

original: ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'bral ba na sbyin par khas ma blangs na de la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'bral ba na sbyin par khas ma blangs na de la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one does not agree to give it when one is about to leave the region, one should not rely on it.🔽When one is about to leave, one should give the water strainer.

original: gang gi tshe 'bral ba yod par gyur na de'i tshe chu tshags sbyin no zhes de ltar chu tshags dang ldan pas chu tshags sbyin par khas blangs na ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'di sbyin par khas blangs pa de dang ldan pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chu
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'bral ba yod par gyur na de'i tshe chu tshags sbyin no zhes de ltar chu tshags dang ldan pas chu tshags sbyin par khas blangs na ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'di sbyin par khas blangs pa de dang ldan pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chu
translated: If one agrees to give the water strainer, one should go to the region with the water strainer.

original: tshags dang ldan pa nyid de /
analyzed: tshags dang ldan pa nyid de /
translated: One should not rely on it.🔽When one is about to leave, one should give the water strainer.

original: de la brten par mi bya ste 'bral ba'i tshe sbyin par khas blangs pa ni snga ma'i khas blangs pa ni phyis 'bral pa'i tshe na med pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten par mi bya ste 'bral ba'i tshe sbyin par khas blangs pa ni snga ma'i khas blangs pa ni phyis 'bral pa'i tshe na med pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One should not rely on the previous agreement to give the water strainer when one is about to leave, because that is not in conformity with the present situation.

original: phongs par mi 'gyur pa'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba ni rgyu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phongs par mi 'gyur pa'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba ni rgyu ba ma yin no //
translated: One should not go to a region where one will be in want.

original: de'i phyir rgyang grags lnga nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyang grags lnga nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, it is five krośas.

original: phongs par mi 'gyur ba ni nye 'khor de nyid do //
analyzed: phongs par mi 'gyur ba ni nye 'khor de nyid do //
translated: The immediate area is where one will not be destitute.🔽Here, their scriptures are as follows:

original: 'dir de dag gi gzhung ni gzhung kha cig las btsun pa chab tshags ma mchis par grong gzhan nas gtsug lag khang gzhan du mchir rung ngam /🔽rung ste gal te der song yang phongs par mi 'gyur na'o zhes bya ba dang / gzhung cig shos kyis ni chab tshags ma tshags ma mchis par shul du zhugs te mchir rung ngam rung ste rgyang lang tshun chad do //
analyzed: 'dir de dag gi gzhung ni gzhung kha cig las btsun pa chab tshags ma mchis par grong gzhan nas gtsug lag khang gzhan du mchir rung ngam / rung ste gal te der song yang phongs par mi 'gyur na'o zhes bya ba dang / gzhung cig shos kyis ni chab tshags ma tshags ma mchis par shul du zhugs te mchir rung ngam rung ste rgyang lang tshun chad do //
translated: In one scripture it says, “Is it permissible for a monk to go from one village to another monastery without provisions?🔽It is permissible if he will not be destitute there.”🔽In another scripture it says, “Is it permissible to enter a road without provisions? It is permissible if he will not be destitute there.”

original: de des der son pa na phongs par ma gyur na zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de des der son pa na phongs par ma gyur na zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If he goes there and is not destitute, he is not at fault.

original: mdo 'di ni gzhung phyi ma shos bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: mdo 'di ni gzhung phyi ma shos bsdu ba yin no //
translated: This sūtra is included in the latter scripture.

original: gang zhig 'dir gal te der zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dir gal te der zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: It is included in the words “if he goes there” and so on.

original: gnas su bzhag ste song ba de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa de ni rang dgar byed pa ma yin pa ma yin @230b no zhes bya ba ni gal te bdag dar song na de dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba de ltar nges pa med na
analyzed: gnas su bzhag ste song ba de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa de ni rang dgar byed pa ma yin pa ma yin @230b no zhes bya ba ni gal te bdag dar song na de dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba de ltar nges pa med na
translated: If it were not so, then it would not be the case that one who has gone to a place and possesses it is not free to do as he wishes.

original: de'i tshe chu tshags med par des der 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe chu tshags med par des der 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: If it were not certain that one who has gone possesses it, then he would not go there without the water-strainer.

original: de bas na de la 'di ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de bas na de la 'di ni byed pa po'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the agent.

original: 'dod pas byas pa nyid de la chu tshags nyid med par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod pas byas pa nyid de la chu tshags nyid med par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the case that one who has gone without the water-strainer possesses it.

original: gcig gis dge 'dun man chad du ma de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun man chad du mdag la gcig gis chu tshags dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig gis dge 'dun man chad du ma de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun man chad du mdag la gcig gis chu tshags dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it were not so, then one who has gone to the Saṅgha and below would not possess it. The meaning is that it is not the case that one who has gone to the Saṅgha and below does not possess the water-strainer.

original: rgyun mgyogs pa la phongs par mi 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i rgyang grags lnga la de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun mgyogs pa la phongs par mi 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i rgyang grags lnga la de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that one who is not endowed with this is not free from the fault of being slow in the stream.

original: 'di la yang cho ga 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la yang cho ga 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, the meaning of this rite is the meaning of this.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun ba chu klung 'bab ba la chab tshags ma mchis par mchir rung ngam /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun ba chu klung 'bab ba la chab tshags ma mchis par mchir rung ngam /
translated: Here, the text says, Venerable, is it permissible to cross a river without a ferry?

original: nye ba 'khor rung ste rgyang grags lnga tshun chad du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor rung ste rgyang grags lnga tshun chad du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upali, it is permissible up to five krośas.

original: de la rgyun phyogs su rjes su 'bral bar 'gro pa ni rgyang grags kyi bar du 'jug tu rung ngo zhes pa la /
analyzed: de la rgyun phyogs su rjes su 'bral bar 'gro pa ni rgyang grags kyi bar du 'jug tu rung ngo zhes pa la /
translated: There, it is permissible to enter up to a krośa in the direction of the stream, following along.

original: chu rtog pa las brtsams te rjes su 'gro bar byed pa na /
analyzed: chu rtog pa las brtsams te rjes su 'gro bar byed pa na /
translated: When one is proceeding by following the river,

original: rgyang grags 'di la rgyun phyogs su chu bo la chu rtog pa de nyid kyis 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rgyang grags 'di la rgyun phyogs su chu bo la chu rtog pa de nyid kyis 'jug pa'o //
translated: in this krośa, one enters by that very reckoning of the river in the direction of the stream.

original: de'i 'og tu slar chu rtog pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu slar chu rtog pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: After that, it means by the reckoning of the river again.

original: cho ga de'i dmigs kyis bsal ba byas pa yin te /
analyzed: cho ga de'i dmigs kyis bsal ba byas pa yin te /
translated: This is a specific rule of that procedure.

original: gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres bar gyur na de man chad du'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres bar gyur na de man chad du'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it mixes with other water, then beyond that.

original: de zhes bya ba ni chu'i rgyun mgyogs pa de rgyang grags gcig gi mthar yang ngo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni chu'i rgyun mgyogs pa de rgyang grags gcig gi mthar yang ngo //
translated: That means that the flow of water is swift, and even at a distance of one krośa.

original: gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres pa de las snga rol du chu rtog pa de nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres pa de las snga rol du chu rtog pa de nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
translated: If it mixes with other water, then before that, one should investigate that very water.

original: chu 'dres pa man chad la ni des yang brtag cing 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chu 'dres pa man chad la ni des yang brtag cing 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that beyond the mixed water, one should investigate and enter.

original: brtags pa nas 'dom gang 'khor yug ni de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni chu brtag pa'i gnas nas 'dom gang 'khor yug tshun chad ni brtags pa nyid yin no /🔽'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chab ka'i nye 'khor gang lags /
analyzed: brtags pa nas 'dom gang 'khor yug ni de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni chu brtag pa'i gnas nas 'dom gang 'khor yug tshun chad ni brtags pa nyid yin no / 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chab ka'i nye 'khor gang lags /
translated: From the point of investigation, up to one fathom in all directions, that is it.

original: nye ba 'khor 'dom gang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor 'dom gang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The text says: Venerable Upāli, what is the boundary of water?🔽Upāli, it is one fathom.

original: nye 'khor zhes bya ba ni chab ka'i dbe tsam nyid yin no zhes bye brag med par gsungs so //
analyzed: nye 'khor zhes bya ba ni chab ka'i dbe tsam nyid yin no zhes bye brag med par gsungs so //
translated: The term “vicinity” means the distance of a krośa.

original: mig gis dag pa nyid kyis chu ni dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mig gis dag pa nyid kyis chu ni dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Water is pure because of the purity of the eye.

original: mig gang gis she na /
analyzed: mig gang gis she na /
translated: What is the eye?

original: de'i phyir tha mal pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mal pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “by the ordinary eye.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags @231a * //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags @231a * //
translated: Here is the text: The Venerable Aniruddha

original: pas lha'i mig gis chu brtags pa na de'i tshe srid pa bar ma pa'i srog chags dag gis thams cad khyab par ma thong nas /
analyzed: pas lha'i mig gis chu brtags pa na de'i tshe srid pa bar ma pa'i srog chags dag gis thams cad khyab par ma thong nas /
translated: examined the water with the divine eye, but did not see it filled with intermediate beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: lha'i mig ni tha snyad du gdags su mi rung ste /
analyzed: lha'i mig ni tha snyad du gdags su mi rung ste /
translated: “The divine eye is not suitable for conventional designation.

original: de bas na lha'i mig gis chu brtag par mi bya bar 'di ltar chu rung ba lnga bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na lha'i mig gis chu brtag par mi bya bar 'di ltar chu rung ba lnga bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the water should not be examined with the divine eye. Rather, the five suitable waters should be explained.”

original: mi g-yo ba nyid dang rnyog pa med pa nyid la brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtag par bya ba'i chu zhes bya ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba nyid dang rnyog pa med pa nyid la brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtag par bya ba'i chu zhes bya ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate whether the water is unmoving and clear. One should understand that “water” is understood by implication.

original: bum pa gang ba nyid la'o zhes bya ba ni brtag par bya zhes bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa gang ba nyid la'o zhes bya ba ni brtag par bya zhes bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
translated: In the case of filling a pot, one should investigate. The verb “one should investigate” is supplied.

original: de la bya sa 'das par bgrang ba'i yun ring po nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni de bya ba las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba yun ring ba nyid kyis grangs su grags pa 'dir ni yun ring po nyid du brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la bya sa 'das par bgrang ba'i yun ring po nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni de bya ba las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba yun ring ba nyid kyis grangs su grags pa 'dir ni yun ring po nyid du brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not count a long time in the past. One should not count a long time in the past in this case, because it is well known that a long time is counted from the present.

original: gang gi phyir ji tsam gyis sems dag par gyur pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji tsam gyis sems dag par gyur pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o //
translated: For one should investigate up to the point at which the mind becomes clear.

original: 'og tu ma grub pa la sems dag par 'gyur bas gdon mi za bar shin tu ring por byas pa nyid kyi phyir shin tu ring por brtag par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'og tu ma grub pa la sems dag par 'gyur bas gdon mi za bar shin tu ring por byas pa nyid kyi phyir shin tu ring por brtag par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Since the mind becomes clear even without establishing a long time in the past, one should not investigate a long time in the past, because it is certainly very long.

original: 'on kyang ji tsam gyis ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta rmig pa'i shar bas bkang ba g-yangs kyis 'khor bar gyur ba de srid du brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ji tsam gyis ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta rmig pa'i shar bas bkang ba g-yangs kyis 'khor bar gyur ba de srid du brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: But it should be investigated to the extent that a cart filled with the hooves of six oxen is carried by a donkey.

original: yang de srid du sems dag par gyur pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de srid du sems dag par gyur pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And to that extent, the mind becomes purified.

original: de la sems dag par gyur pa zhes bya ba de la sems dag par gyur ces bya ba ni mig gis dag pa nyid ces bya ba de yin pas /
analyzed: de la sems dag par gyur pa zhes bya ba de la sems dag par gyur ces bya ba ni mig gis dag pa nyid ces bya ba de yin pas /
translated: There, the mind becomes purified means that the eye becomes pure.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di las lhag par gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di las lhag par gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not superior to what was said before.

original: ba lang drug gis zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'dir tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang drug gis zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'dir tshad ma yin te /
translated: Six oxen means that this itself is the measure here.

original: dus 'di tsam gyis de la phal cher bsgrub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus 'di tsam gyis de la phal cher bsgrub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By this much time, it is mostly accomplished.

original: ha cang yun ring du brtag par mi bya bar zhes bya ba 'dis 'di bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ha cang yun ring du brtag par mi bya bar zhes bya ba 'dis 'di bsdus pa yin no //
translated: By this, it is included that it should not be investigated for too long.

original: 'dir rtse gcig pa ni rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rtse gcig pa ni rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Here, one-pointedness is stability.

original: rtse mo 'jam pos srog chags dag bstan la'o //🔽de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam du mi 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni chu'i srog chags de dag dor ba'i lam gyi thag ji srid kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi thag de srid du dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rtse mo 'jam pos srog chags dag bstan la'o // de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam du mi 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni chu'i srog chags de dag dor ba'i lam gyi thag ji srid kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi thag de srid du dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: The tops are soft and do not harm living beings.🔽One should not throw them on a path where they will die.🔽One should not throw them on a path where they will die means one should not throw them on a path where they will die after traveling a certain distance.

original: gzhan yang mi dor ro zhes bya ba ni chu'i srog chags dag las gzhan la shig dang rtsva shig la sogs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur @231b ba'i lam gyi thag de srid du mi dor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dor ro zhes bya ba ni chu'i srog chags dag las gzhan la shig dang rtsva shig la sogs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur @231b ba'i lam gyi thag de srid du mi dor ro //
translated: One should not throw them on a path where they will die means one should not throw them on a path where they will die after traveling a certain distance.

original: gal te mar me'i nang du srog chags ltung na de byed pas de g-yogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mar med de byed pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te mar me'i nang du srog chags ltung na de byed pas de g-yogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mar med de byed pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If a living being falls into a lamp, one should cover it with something so that it does not die.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of that?

original: de'i phyir smyig tshal gyi gzeb dar dkar ram lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs pa ste de zhes bya ba ni 'od khang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir smyig tshal gyi gzeb dar dkar ram lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs pa ste de zhes bya ba ni 'od khang zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that one should cover it with a piece of white cloth or a thin piece of bamboo.

original: mig brgya pa yang rung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mig brgya pa yang rung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or else, it is a hundred-eyed one.

original: 'dir gzhung ni 'od khang gi gzeb dar dkar gyis g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni 'od khang gi gzeb dar dkar gyis g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: Here is the text: “The light chamber is covered with white cotton cloth.

original: de mi rnyed na lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de mi rnyed na lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: If that is not available, it is covered with thin silk.

original: de yang ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de yang ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: If that is not available, the Blessed One said:

original: mig brgya pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mig brgya pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Make it a hundred-eyed one.”

original: mig brgya pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: mig brgya pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is a hundred-eyed one?

original: de'i phyir dang po nas byas pa'am bum pa la sogs pa'i snod bu gcan no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dang po nas byas pa'am bum pa la sogs pa'i snod bu gcan no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said: “Either made from the beginning, or a vessel such as a pot with a hundred holes.”

original: dang po nyid du skyed par byed pa'i byas pa 'di la yod pas na dang po nyid du byas pa'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid du skyed par byed pa'i byas pa 'di la yod pas na dang po nyid du byas pa'o //
translated: Because it has the quality of being made from the beginning, it is made from the beginning.

original: sa las byas pa'i snod bum pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba gyo mog gi rnam pa lta bu'i snod kyi tshogs bya ste so btang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sa las byas pa'i snod bum pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba gyo mog gi rnam pa lta bu'i snod kyi tshogs bya ste so btang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: A collection of vessels made of clay, shaped like a pot, like a pile of potsherds, is made. The meaning of “with holes” is “with openings.”

original: 'dir brgya'i tshig ni mang ngo nyid du bstan pa tsam du rnam par gnas pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir brgya'i tshig ni mang ngo nyid du bstan pa tsam du rnam par gnas pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that it is a case of “merely remaining.”

original: skra'i rnyis sbrul gzung bar mi bya ba ni 'o na 'di ji ltar bsal bar bya zhe na /🔽de'i phyir se gol gyi sgra phyung ste /
analyzed: skra'i rnyis sbrul gzung bar mi bya ba ni 'o na 'di ji ltar bsal bar bya zhe na / de'i phyir se gol gyi sgra phyung ste /
translated: “One should not grasp the snake with one’s hand” — but how then should it be removed?

original: bzhin bzangs mig lam nam 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs mig lam nam 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “One should snap one’s fingers and say, ‘Good man, go away from the path of my vision!’”

original: de skad brjod kyang mig lam na 'dug na de'i tshe ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de skad brjod kyang mig lam na 'dug na de'i tshe ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: If, despite this, it remains in the path of one’s vision, what should one do then?

original: de'i phyir mi 'dug na dbyug gu skam khas dal bu dal bus rdza ma'am bum par bcug ste kha bcad nas bu ga btod de bsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi 'dug na dbyug gu skam khas dal bu dal bus rdza ma'am bum par bcug ste kha bcad nas bu ga btod de bsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “If it does not go away, one should slowly and slowly insert a dry bamboo cane into a pot or a jar, cover the mouth, make a hole in it, and remove it.”

original: kha zhes bya ba ni bum pa'am rdza ma de'o //
analyzed: kha zhes bya ba ni bum pa'am rdza ma de'o //
translated: “Mouth” refers to the pot or the jar.

original: ma grub na lcag pod dam shur bu phre'u 'am the gur sams dkris pas zhags mig gis mgul par bcings te dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub na lcag pod dam shur bu phre'u 'am the gur sams dkris pas zhags mig gis mgul par bcings te dor bar bya'o //
translated: If that is not successful, one should bind it with a rope made of strips of bamboo, or a rope made of strips of wood, or a rope made of strips of cane, or a rope made of strips of kuśa grass, and throw it away.

original: de dag ni gzhug pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag ni gzhug pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And they are also to be placed in them.

original: lcag pod la sogs pa 'di rnams dor ba 'ba' zhig la bya bar ma zad kyi bum pa la sogs pa la gzhug pa la yang bya'o //
analyzed: lcag pod la sogs pa 'di rnams dor ba 'ba' zhig la bya bar ma zad kyi bum pa la sogs pa la gzhug pa la yang bya'o //
translated: This is not only to be done with regard to the throwing away of the whip, etc., but also with regard to the placing of the pot, etc.

original: tshang tshing gi nang du dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba bsal ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: tshang tshing gi nang du dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba bsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: The statement, “They are not to be thrown into the thickets” is for the purpose of avoiding birth.

original: khung du zhugs kyi bar du bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khung du zhugs kyi bar du bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “They are to be kept until they enter the hole.”

original: 'dir bar du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bzhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir bar du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bzhag pa ste /
translated: Here the word “until” is a preposition.

original: ji srid khung du zhugs kyi bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'ol ba la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di la srog gcod @232a * //
analyzed: ji srid khung du zhugs kyi bar du zhes bya ba'i don to // 'ol ba la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di la srog gcod @232a * //
translated: The meaning is: “as long as they enter the hole.”

original: par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni 'dir don to //🔽de bas na bla gab med par ni 'di rnams la ni byed pa po ste /
analyzed: par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni 'dir don to // de bas na bla gab med par ni 'di rnams la ni byed pa po ste /
translated: The statement, “May they not be killed by wolves, etc.” is the meaning here.

original: nags la ni ma yin zhes bya ba don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: nags la ni ma yin zhes bya ba don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is understood by implication: “With regard to these, the agent is in the open, not in the forest.”

original: shig rnams ni ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: shig rnams ni ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The lice are to be placed in the cloth.

original: de ni gseb dag tu'o zhes bya ba ni ras ma de ni ka ba la sogs pa'i gseb dag tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gseb dag tu'o zhes bya ba ni ras ma de ni ka ba la sogs pa'i gseb dag tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: That is, in the interstices. The cloth should be placed in the interstices of pillars, etc.

original: 'dir gzhung ni ras ma'i nang du dkris te ka ba'i gseb bam rtsig pa'i gseb dag tu gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni ras ma'i nang du dkris te ka ba'i gseb bam rtsig pa'i gseb dag tu gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says that the cloth should be rolled up and placed in the interstices of pillars or walls.

original: rtsa shig rnams ni bsing mar ro //
analyzed: rtsa shig rnams ni bsing mar ro //
translated: The roots should be placed in a cool place.

original: yang na phyogs bsil bar ro zhes bya ba ni gang du gnas pa bsgrub pa de zhes bya ba don gyis shes pa'o ;
analyzed: yang na phyogs bsil bar ro zhes bya ba ni gang du gnas pa bsgrub pa de zhes bya ba don gyis shes pa'o ;
translated: Or in a cool place, means in a place where the roots will not be destroyed.🔽In order to introduce the former, a container should be kept for water.

original: / snga ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir bsal snod bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di la chu'i srog chags rnams kyi skabs sngar mdzad pa de rnams gzhug pa'i don du de lta bu bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: / snga ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir bsal snod bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di la chu'i srog chags rnams kyi skabs sngar mdzad pa de rnams gzhug pa'i don du de lta bu bcang bar bya'o //
translated: That is, in order to introduce the former, a container should be kept for the sake of those who have previously made a place for water-animals.

original: bum pa gang bzhin du gzhug cing shin tu stong par dbyung du rung ba zhes bya ba ni bsal ba'i snod brjod pa nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa gang bzhin du gzhug cing shin tu stong par dbyung du rung ba zhes bya ba ni bsal ba'i snod brjod pa nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The statement, “it is suitable to be filled like a pot and to be emptied well,” is not to be stated because it is established by the very statement of the vessel to be emptied.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang bar 'jug pa de ni gang ba kho na ldang ba ma yin gyi de bas bsal snod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang bar 'jug pa de ni gang ba kho na ldang ba ma yin gyi de bas bsal snod du 'gyur ro //
translated: For, when something is inserted into something else, it is not only the full one that is removed, but also the empty one.

original: yang na chu tshags de nyid kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang gis srog chags de dag btsags par gyur pa'i chu tshags de nyid kyis 'di rnams la bu ga rnams kyi ltung ba ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: yang na chu tshags de nyid kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang gis srog chags de dag btsags par gyur pa'i chu tshags de nyid kyis 'di rnams la bu ga rnams kyi ltung ba ma grub pa'o //
translated: Or, “it is to be filled with that very water strainer” means that it is not established that these holes are for the falling of those living beings that have been strained by that very water strainer.

original: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here, this is the meaning.

original: de bas na gzhan bsags par byed pas 'di mi bya zhing shes par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan bsags par byed pas 'di mi bya zhing shes par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be done and is not to be known by another.

original: chu tshags la srog chags chags pa bsal ba'i thabs ni bshal ba yin no //
analyzed: chu tshags la srog chags chags pa bsal ba'i thabs ni bshal ba yin no //
translated: The method of removing living beings that have adhered to the water strainer is washing.

original: dri ma ni bkru ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dri ma chags pa bsal ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: dri ma ni bkru ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dri ma chags pa bsal ba'i thabs so //
translated: The stain is the dirt, is the means of removing the dirt that has adhered.

original: rul pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni skam pa'o zhes bya ba yang /
analyzed: rul pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni skam pa'o zhes bya ba yang /
translated: Not becoming rotten is drying, is the means of drying.

original: thabs shes rab rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: thabs shes rab rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The application of wisdom and means is the means of drying.

original: rul pa'i dngos po ni rul pa nyid do //
analyzed: rul pa'i dngos po ni rul pa nyid do //
translated: The thing that is rotten is rottenness.

original: de gnyi ga la yang dam du btsir na phan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni dri ma bsal ba dang rul pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar bya ba la'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga la yang dam du btsir na phan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni dri ma bsal ba dang rul pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar bya ba la'o //
translated: Both of these are beneficial if one presses hard, is with regard to removing the dirt and preventing rottenness.

original: dge 'dun dang gang zag dang chu tshags dang chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba med do zhes bya ba ni 'dir tshad ma rnyed pa'i sgra la so sor shes pas zhes bya ba ni 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun dang gang zag dang chu tshags dang chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba med do zhes bya ba ni 'dir tshad ma rnyed pa'i sgra la so sor shes pas zhes bya ba ni 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: There is no offense if one enters with the knowledge that the Saṅgha, the individual, the water strainer, or the water measure cannot be found, is the means of knowing that the Saṅgha, the individual, the water strainer, or the water measure cannot be found.

original: de ltar na dge 'dun tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa dang / gang zag chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas @232b 'jug pa dang chu tshags tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa dang chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dge 'dun tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa dang / gang zag chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas @232b 'jug pa dang chu tshags tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa dang chu tshad ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the first is the one who engages with the knowledge that has obtained the measure of the Saṅgha, the second is the one who engages with the knowledge that has obtained the measure of the person, the third is the one who engages with the knowledge that has obtained the measure of the water strainer, and the fourth is the one who engages with the knowledge that has not obtained the measure of the water.

original: de la dge 'dun tshad ma rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun 'di la ma dag pa nyid med pa dang chu tha snyad byed pa med do zhes bya ba ma lus par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la dge 'dun tshad ma rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun 'di la ma dag pa nyid med pa dang chu tha snyad byed pa med do zhes bya ba ma lus par shes pa'o //
translated: Among them, the one who has obtained the measure of the Saṅgha is the one who completely understands that there is no impurity in this Saṅgha and that there is no conventional usage of water.

original: gang zag 'di ni dag pa ma yin pa dang / chu des tha snyad du byed pa zhes bya ba gang zag chu tshags 'di dang bum tshags gce'u can nam de dag thams cad kyis chu dag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chu tshags kyi'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni dag pa ma yin pa dang / chu des tha snyad du byed pa zhes bya ba gang zag chu tshags 'di dang bum tshags gce'u can nam de dag thams cad kyis chu dag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chu tshags kyi'o //
translated: The one who has obtained the measure of the person is the one who understands that this person is not pure and that he uses that water. The one who has obtained the measure of the water strainer is the one who understands that all of these water strainers, such as the one with a spout, are not pure water.

original: chu 'di la phyogs 'di 'am thams cad du nam yang srog chags dang bcas pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu 'di la phyogs 'di 'am thams cad du nam yang srog chags dang bcas pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This water is never inhabited by living beings in this or any other direction.

original: de bas na chu tshags la tshad ma rnyed pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na chu tshags la tshad ma rnyed pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the water strainer is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: tha snyad kyi dus su chegs pa nyid gang yin pa de la 'dir yan lag nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi dus su chegs pa nyid gang yin pa de la 'dir yan lag nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is accepted in conventional usage is to be understood as a limb here.

original: khyim pa la yang gang zag gi tshig gis bzung ba nyid la sbyar bar gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyim pa la yang gang zag gi tshig gis bzung ba nyid la sbyar bar gyur pa nyid do //
translated: Even for a layperson, it is only what is grasped by the word “person” that is applied.

original: 'dir gzhung ni chu rung ba nyid du rnams pa lnga ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni chu rung ba nyid du rnams pa lnga ste /
translated: Here, the text states that there are five types of acceptable water:

original: dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang gang zag gis rung ba dang chu tshags kyis rung ba dang / khron pas rung ba dang / nyin zhag gcig tu rung ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang gang zag gis rung ba dang chu tshags kyis rung ba dang / khron pas rung ba dang / nyin zhag gcig tu rung ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: acceptable to the Saṅgha, acceptable to the individual, acceptable by means of a strainer, acceptable from a well, and acceptable for one day.

original: de la rung ba dang po bzhin ni mdo 'dis bsdus pa yin te go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: de la rung ba dang po bzhin ni mdo 'dis bsdus pa yin te go rims bzhin no //
translated: The first four types of acceptable water are included in this sūtra, in the same order.

original: lnga pa nyin zhag gcig tu rung ba'i btung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lnga pa nyin zhag gcig tu rung ba'i btung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the fifth type of acceptable water, which is acceptable for one day, the text says:🔽“Bhikṣus, if you drink water that is acceptable for one day, you will not be without water.”

original: bcus pa dang khron pa dag ni nyi ma 'char ka tshun chad brtags pa de nyid rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bcus pa dang khron pa dag ni nyi ma 'char ka tshun chad brtags pa de nyid rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la /
translated: The well and the water-pitcher are to be examined until sunrise, and that very examination is to be followed.

original: 'dir khron pa zhes bya ba ni chu dong yin par reg par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir khron pa zhes bya ba ni chu dong yin par reg par bya'o //
translated: Here, a well is to be understood as a water-pit.

original: rkang khrus snod stong par mthong na dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rkang khrus snod stong par mthong na dgang bar bya'o //
translated: If one sees an empty foot-washing vessel, it is to be filled.

original: chu dang gzhan gyi snod kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdza ma dang bum pa dang / chu'i snod la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: chu dang gzhan gyi snod kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdza ma dang bum pa dang / chu'i snod la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: And a vessel of water and another vessel are to be placed nearby.

original: dge 'dun gyis der gtogs pa ni snod spyad 'thub pa'i las yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis der gtogs pa ni snod spyad 'thub pa'i las yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Saṅgha's share is the work of repairing vessels.

original: der rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni chu'i snod la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: der rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni chu'i snod la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Here, belonging to that means being connected with a water-vessel, etc.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gnas mal gyi gzhi las yon bdag gtsug lag khang du lhags te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gnas mal gyi gzhi las yon bdag gtsug lag khang du lhags te /
translated: Here, the text from the Foundation of the Vinaya is: A patron came to the monastery.

original: de dag rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dag red pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bskur cig ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de dag rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dag red pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bskur cig ces bka' stsal to //
translated: They were using vessels made by a potter. The Blessed One said, Let them be given.

original: de dag sus kyang ma bsdus pas de dag chud zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de dag sus kyang ma bsdus pas de dag chud zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong snod spyad 'brub pa bsko bar bya zhing des kyang 'ong ba dag la sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong snod spyad 'brub pa bsko bar bya zhing des kyang 'ong ba dag la sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Monks, a monk should be appointed to collect the bowls. He should give them to those who come.”

original: 'dir sbyin pa dang blang @233a * //
analyzed: 'dir sbyin pa dang blang @233a * //
translated: Here, giving and taking are not excluded.

original: ba dag kyang ma 'dus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la 'dir zhes bya ba bzung ba la'o //
analyzed: ba dag kyang ma 'dus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la 'dir zhes bya ba bzung ba la'o //
translated: Here means in the collection.

original: sbyin pa dang blang ba zhes bya ba ni 'di yang snod spyad 'brub pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang blang ba zhes bya ba ni 'di yang snod spyad 'brub pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Giving and taking are also to be done by the monk appointed to collect the bowls.

original: gnas mal gyi gzhi las gang zhig 'di de rnams ma bsdus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang blang ba ngag kyang snod spyad 'brub pas bya ba bstan pa 'di la ni 'di bsdus pa nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gnas mal gyi gzhi las gang zhig 'di de rnams ma bsdus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang blang ba ngag kyang snod spyad 'brub pas bya ba bstan pa 'di la ni 'di bsdus pa nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: In this teaching on giving and taking from the basis of bedding, where it says “those not collected by them,” etc., it shows that they are included in this collection.

original: khyim pa rnying pa brnyan pa nyid la de yod pa nyid la ni sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnying pa de yod pa nyid yin na g-yar por sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pa rnying pa brnyan pa nyid la de yod pa nyid la ni sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnying pa de yod pa nyid yin na g-yar por sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If the old monk is still alive, it should be given to him.🔽This does not mean that it should not be given to the patrons who come to the monastery.

original: des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams la sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni des yon bdag la sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i tshig des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams 'ongs te brnyan pa
analyzed: des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams la sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni des yon bdag la sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i tshig des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams 'ongs te brnyan pa
translated: This does not mean that it should not be given to the patrons who come to the monastery.

original: dag la g-yar ba sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa ma yin pa de ni sngar gzhung las /
analyzed: dag la g-yar ba sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa ma yin pa de ni sngar gzhung las /
translated: This is shown by the earlier passage in the text:

original: yon bdag gtsug lag lang du lhags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de nyid 'dis bsdus pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: yon bdag gtsug lag lang du lhags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de nyid 'dis bsdus pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: “When the patrons come to the monastery...” and so on. This shows that the present passage is a summary of that.

original: dge slong la ni sar pa phyis blang ba med pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba ni snod spyad sar pa dge slong la thams cad kyi thams cad du sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong la ni sar pa phyis blang ba med pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba ni snod spyad sar pa dge slong la thams cad kyi thams cad du sbyin pa'o //
translated: This means that new utensils are given to monks in all cases.

original: de yang de yod pa gnyis la sbyin pa 'di cha gcig gis brtags pa'o //🔽'dir gzhung ni dge slong rnams la ni sar pa dag sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang de yod pa gnyis la sbyin pa 'di cha gcig gis brtags pa'o // 'dir gzhung ni dge slong rnams la ni sar pa dag sbyin par bya'o //
translated: And that is given to those who have two, this is designated by a part.🔽Here the text says: New ones should be given to the monks.

original: khyim pa rnams la ni rnying pa dag brnyan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyim pa rnams la ni rnying pa dag brnyan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Old ones should be given to the householders.

original: snod spyad kyi ched du mdzod khang bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: snod spyad kyi ched du mdzod khang bsko bar bya'o //
translated: A storehouse should be designated for the sake of utensils.🔽Earthen and copper utensils should be placed separately.

original: sa dang zangs ma'i snod spyad dag so sor gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir tha dad pa nyid du gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya'i gnas tha dad par ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sa dang zangs ma'i snod spyad dag so sor gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir tha dad pa nyid du gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya'i gnas tha dad par ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: This means that here the difference must be established without doubt, but not the difference in location.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gnas brtan gnyis pa sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gnas brtan gnyis pa sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Here the text says: The second elder should be given.

original: gang du zangs las byas pa'i snod spyad dag gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: gang du zangs las byas pa'i snod spyad dag gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
translated: Where copper vessels are placed means that this is the place for them.

original: de ni 'dir de dang rtse gcig pa nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'dir de dang rtse gcig pa nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is the same as that.

original: chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Water should be placed.

original: gar bab bab tu mi gzhag go //
analyzed: gar bab bab tu mi gzhag go //
translated: It should not be placed haphazardly.

original: de'i ched du chu khang bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ched du chu khang bya'o //
translated: For that purpose, a water house should be built.

original: gtsug lag khang gi lho nub kyi mtshams su'o zhes bya ba la lho nub kyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni sgo ni shar phyogs su nges par bya ste zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi lho nub kyi mtshams su'o zhes bya ba la lho nub kyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni sgo ni shar phyogs su nges par bya ste zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In the southwest corner of the monastery. The southwest corner means that the door should be determined to face east.

original: sgo phyogs gzhan du lta ba la ni /
analyzed: sgo phyogs gzhan du lta ba la ni /
translated: For those whose door faces other directions,

original: lho dang nub kyi phyogs @233b mtshams kho nar cha dang 'brel pa'i mtshams kyi rtsa ba la byed pa khang pa'i mtshams spang nang du bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lho dang nub kyi phyogs @233b mtshams kho nar cha dang 'brel pa'i mtshams kyi rtsa ba la byed pa khang pa'i mtshams spang nang du bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: in the southwest direction itself, at the root of the corner connected with the part, it is said that the corner of the house should be abandoned inside.

original: 'dir phyogs 'di'i nang du yin gyi gar bab bab tu ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir phyogs 'di'i nang du yin gyi gar bab bab tu ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, it means that it is inside this direction, not haphazardly.

original: skar khung gdod pa dang so phag gi gcal dgram pa dang / chu khung gdod pa dang sgo gdod pa dang sgo glegs dang yang mig gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: skar khung gdod pa dang so phag gi gcal dgram pa dang / chu khung gdod pa dang sgo gdod pa dang sgo glegs dang yang mig gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The windows should be made, the brick floor should be laid, the water drain should be made, the door should be made, the door bolt and the eye-hole should be put in.

original: chu tshags gzhag pa'i phyir gdang bu bya'o zhes bya ba la /🔽'dir gzhung ni sbyin pa ste der gdang bu bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu tshags gzhag pa'i phyir gdang bu bya'o zhes bya ba la / 'dir gzhung ni sbyin pa ste der gdang bu bcing bar bya'o //
translated: A shelf should be made for the water strainer.🔽The text is: “A shelf should be made there for the water strainer.”

original: gang du chu tshags rung ba dag gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang du chu tshags rung ba dag gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said that the water strainer should be placed there.

original: shing gi khri'u dag la gzhag go zhes bya ba ni chu snod la zhes bya ba la skabs kyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: shing gi khri'u dag la gzhag go zhes bya ba ni chu snod la zhes bya ba la skabs kyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is placed on wooden stools. The context is that it is placed on a water vessel.

original: yang na so phag gi stegs bu'i steng du bya'o zhes bya ba ni de tsam nyid kyis ma yin te 'on kyang gzhi dag la'o zhes bya bas te /
analyzed: yang na so phag gi stegs bu'i steng du bya'o zhes bya ba ni de tsam nyid kyis ma yin te 'on kyang gzhi dag la'o zhes bya bas te /
translated: Or it is placed on a brick platform. It is not just that, but also on the ground.

original: ma mo las rgyu bar bya zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: ma mo las rgyu bar bya zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is said that one should move around in the mother. This is the conclusion.

original: chu snod ni khrus chu'i ched kyi bar yan chad gtsang sbra bya ba ni gzhan gyis slob dpon la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i cho ga 'di rtogs pa'i don du gzhan gyi don gyi tshig nye bar blang ba'o //
analyzed: chu snod ni khrus chu'i ched kyi bar yan chad gtsang sbra bya ba ni gzhan gyis slob dpon la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i cho ga 'di rtogs pa'i don du gzhan gyi don gyi tshig nye bar blang ba'o //
translated: The water vessel is for the water used for washing, etc. The purification of these is for the sake of understanding the rite of consecration that is related to the master, etc. and is for the sake of others.

original: de ni 'dir dri ma med par bya ba bsgrub pa bstan pa de ni gtsang bar bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir gtsang bar ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ni 'dir dri ma med par bya ba bsgrub pa bstan pa de ni gtsang bar bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir gtsang bar ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Here, the purification of the site is taught for the sake of accomplishing the stainless. In order to teach that, he says, “purify the site.”

original: yongs su longs spyod par byed pa la gtsang ba nyid du byed pa dang / sbyor shes par bya ba ma yin te shin tu yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su longs spyod par byed pa la gtsang ba nyid du byed pa dang / sbyor shes par bya ba ma yin te shin tu yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not to be understood as a preparation, because it is already existent.

original: de'i gnas 'jog pa yongs su dag pas gtsang bar byed pas gtsang ba nyid la'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas 'jog pa yongs su dag pas gtsang bar byed pas gtsang ba nyid la'o //
translated: It is for the sake of purification, because the site is purified by the purification of the site.

original: btung bar bya ba'i chu yang ngo zhes bya ba ni btung bar bya ba'i chu yang gtsang sbra dang gtsang bar bya'o //
analyzed: btung bar bya ba'i chu yang ngo zhes bya ba ni btung bar bya ba'i chu yang gtsang sbra dang gtsang bar bya'o //
translated: The water for drinking is also pure. The water for drinking is also pure and should be purified.

original: yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i chu la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtsang sbra bsgrub pa 'di ni rjes su 'brangs pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i chu la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtsang sbra bsgrub pa 'di ni rjes su 'brangs pas shes par bya'o //
translated: The purification that is in conformity with that should be understood through the following.

original: de lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa dag gis brim par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la de zhes bya ba ni btung bar bya ba'i chu'o //
analyzed: de lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa dag gis brim par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la de zhes bya ba ni btung bar bya ba'i chu'o //
translated: He should not serve the water that is to be drunk with his hand or with a cloth that is not fit.

original: lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas reg pas nye bar 'bags par gyur pa dag gis so //
analyzed: lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas reg pas nye bar 'bags par gyur pa dag gis so //
translated: With his hand or with a cloth that is not fit means with a hand or with a cloth that is not fit because it is defiled by contact.

original: chu snod rnams kyi nang dus dus su sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chu snod rnams kyi nang dus dus su sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: From time to time he should add water to the water-pots.

original: nang zhes bya ba ni khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: nang zhes bya ba ni khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'o //
translated: From time to time means from time to time.

original: phyi rol du ni gtsang sbra zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis byas pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni gtsang sbra zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis byas pa'o //
translated: This is done by means of the purification that is external.

original: zab mo rnams kyi ni pu shel tsi'i khrud shing ngam 'dab ma'i chang bu'am ras ma shing bu'i rtse mo la btags @234a * //
analyzed: zab mo rnams kyi ni pu shel tsi'i khrud shing ngam 'dab ma'i chang bu'am ras ma shing bu'i rtse mo la btags @234a * //
translated: In the case of deep water-pots, he should add water with a strainer, a leaf, or a piece of cloth tied to a stick.

original: pas so zhes bya ba la pu shel tsi zhes bya ba 'di la gang du rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi khrud shing zhes bya bar smos pa de bas na 'dir yongs su gyur pa 'di la 'brel pa shes par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: pas so zhes bya ba la pu shel tsi zhes bya ba 'di la gang du rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi khrud shing zhes bya bar smos pa de bas na 'dir yongs su gyur pa 'di la 'brel pa shes par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this transformation is not to be understood as a connection here.

original: de la zas kyi 'brel zer mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la zas kyi 'brel zer mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: In that case, one should not be careless about the connection with food.

original: de zhes bya ba ni pu shel tsi'i shing la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni pu shel tsi'i shing la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word that refers to the pūshela tree, etc.🔽That which becomes with material becomes with materiality.

original: gang zhig zang zing can du 'gyur ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba de la ni mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig zang zing can du 'gyur ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba de la ni mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya'o //
translated: In that case, one should not be careless.

original: mi rung ba nyid yod pa la 'di ni rung bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mi rung ba nyid yod pa la 'di ni rung bar byed pa yin te /
translated: When there is unsuitability, this makes it suitable.

original: 'di ni gtsang bar bya'o zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gtsang bar bya'o zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: This is to be purified. This is taught in that case.

original: bskam par yang ngo zhes bya ba ni chu snod bkru bshal byas pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: bskam par yang ngo zhes bya ba ni chu snod bkru bshal byas pa rnams la'o //
translated: Drying is also, referring to water vessels that have been washed and rinsed.

original: de'i tshe 'brel par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir cig car nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bkru bshal bya ba dang bskam pa'i dus de la brel par ma gyur cig ces bya ba 'di'i don cig car nyid du 'di bkru ba dang bskam par mi
analyzed: de'i tshe 'brel par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir cig car nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bkru bshal bya ba dang bskam pa'i dus de la brel par ma gyur cig ces bya ba 'di'i don cig car nyid du 'di bkru ba dang bskam par mi
translated: The meaning of this is that one should not wash and dry it all at once, thinking, “May I not be busy at the time of washing, rinsing, and drying.”

original: bya'o // snod rnams kun la dus gcig tu ma yin no //
analyzed: bya'o // snod rnams kun la dus gcig tu ma yin no //
translated: It is not done all at once for all vessels.

original: chu dang 'brel pa'i las ni gnas pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams la brtsam pa dang gzhan la brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chu dang 'brel pa'i las ni gnas pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams la brtsam pa dang gzhan la brjod pa'o //
translated: The action connected with water is done by the resident monks.🔽Here the text is: The Blessed One said, “The water should be taken.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chu blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong gis sus blang bar bya mi shes nas /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chu blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong gis sus blang bar bya mi shes nas /
translated: When the monks did not know who should take it,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: the Blessed One said,

original: gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “The residents should do it.”

original: chu khang gi 'khor du gtogs pa dang chu tshags kyi bya ba yang 'di rnams nyid la rigs pa yin gyi gzhan du na yang zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chu khang gi 'khor du gtogs pa dang chu tshags kyi bya ba yang 'di rnams nyid la rigs pa yin gyi gzhan du na yang zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is proper for these to be included in the water-house and to be the function of the water-strainer. Otherwise, this would not be taught.

original: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu dang 'brel pa phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so /
analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu dang 'brel pa phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so /
translated: This is the section on the minor matters related to water that contains living beings.

original: // / shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: // / shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
translated: The word predominantly means that perception is the principal factor.

original: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po yin zhe na /
translated: In what is perception the principal factor?

original: de'i phyir zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, in the case of entering or directing one's mind.

original: ci zhig la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la zhe na de'i spyod pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ci zhig la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la zhe na de'i spyod pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What is it that enters or directs the mind? It is said, in the case of conduct.

original: gnyis kyis gnyis spyod pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis kyis gnyis spyod pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is in the case of the conduct of two with two.

original: gang gi spyod pa la zhe na de'i phyir skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gang gi spyod pa la zhe na de'i phyir skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: What is the conduct? Therefore, it is said, of a man and a woman.

original: ci gnas skabs 'di thams cad la yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs 'di thams cad la yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is this the case in all circumstances?

original: de'i phyir khyim pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyim pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “because of being a layperson.”

original: gal te skyes pa dang bud med gnyis khyim pa nyid yin na'o zhes bya ba'i @234b don to //
analyzed: gal te skyes pa dang bud med gnyis khyim pa nyid yin na'o zhes bya ba'i @234b don to //
translated: The meaning is: if both the man and the woman are laypeople.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba gcig la yang khyim pa nyid ma yin pa la mchog pa'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba gcig la yang khyim pa nyid ma yin pa la mchog pa'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: if they are not laypeople, then the offense of sexual misconduct is generated.

original: ci de gnyis gnas gang na 'dug kyang rung ngam zhe na /
