translated: The action of eating is not performed by means of a series of vessels.

original: ji ltar chang 'thung ba dag phan tshun skom snod brgyud pas chang 'thung bar byed pa de ltar mi bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar chang 'thung ba dag phan tshun skom snod brgyud pas chang 'thung bar byed pa de ltar mi bya'o //
translated: Just as those who drink alcohol do not drink by means of a series of vessels, so it is not done.

original: me tog rna rgyan brgyu bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: me tog rna rgyan brgyu bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The flower garland is not passed around.

original: bzo rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i spros pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bzo rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i spros pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the elaboration is not to be performed.

original: gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni me tog rna rgyan zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni me tog rna rgyan zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should not wear a flower garland means one should not wear a flower garland on the ears.

original: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: This is just an illustration.

original: 'dis phreng ba brgyu zheng 'dogs pa thams cad la dgag par byas pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis phreng ba brgyu zheng 'dogs pa thams cad la dgag par byas pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this is a prohibition against all kinds of wearing garlands.

original: ngo so las byung bar sbyin par mi bya'o //🔽mi rings par rgyug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ngo so las byung bar sbyin par mi bya'o // mi rings par rgyug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not give a gift for the sake of fame.🔽One should not run quickly.

original: myur ba dang mchongs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: myur ba dang mchongs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not run fast or jump.

original: brla dang lag pa nya ltar bskor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: brla dang lag pa nya ltar bskor bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not swim with one's thighs or arms.

original: chur gseg ma dag gdab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: chur gseg ma dag gdab par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not throw sand into the water.

original: chur rdza rnga kha cig @256b pa dang rnga bo che ltar brdung par mi bya'o //
analyzed: chur rdza rnga kha cig @256b pa dang rnga bo che ltar brdung par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not beat the water with one's hands like a drum or a kettle drum.

original: rdza ba la phyil mo nyug par mi bya'o //🔽glang po che'i skad dang / rta'i skad dang / khyu mchog gi skad dang / khu byug gi skad mi dbyung ngo //
analyzed: rdza ba la phyil mo nyug par mi bya'o // glang po che'i skad dang / rta'i skad dang / khyu mchog gi skad dang / khu byug gi skad mi dbyung ngo //
translated: One should not suck the water with one's mouth.🔽One should not make the sounds of an elephant, a horse, a bull, or a cuckoo.

original: khas dung dang sil khrol dang rnga bo che'i skad mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: khas dung dang sil khrol dang rnga bo che'i skad mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should not make the sounds of a conch, cymbals, or a kettle drum.

original: longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: It is a downfall that is part of the basis of enjoyment.🔽What is done to incur the downfall of bathing?

original: // / ci zhig byas na khrus byas pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la mdun rol gyi gnas la zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: // / ci zhig byas na khrus byas pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la mdun rol gyi gnas la zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: In this case, the answer is “in advance.”

original: gang gis mdun rol nas zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la khrus kyi zhag bco lnga po las bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis mdun rol nas zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la khrus kyi zhag bco lnga po las bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: In response to the question, “What is done in advance?” the answer is “one should do the bathing on the fifteen days.”

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: dus gzhan du gang zhag bco lnga pa las khrus kyi zhag gcig bya ba 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dus gzhan du gang zhag bco lnga pa las khrus kyi zhag gcig bya ba 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: In response to the question, “From what?” the answer is “one should do the bathing on one day from among the fifteen days.”🔽In response to the question, “How many?” the answer is “one and a half months.”

original: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis ngang dbyar rnams kyi dad po las so zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ci tsam pas zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang / gang gi zla ba phyed dang gnyis lhag pa'i lhag ma zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la so ga rnams kyi zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis ngang dbyar rnams kyi dad po las so zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ci tsam pas zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang / gang gi zla ba phyed dang gnyis lhag pa'i lhag ma zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'di la so ga rnams kyi zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In response to the question, “From what?” the answer is “from the remaining two and a half months of summer.”

original: ci so ga'i zla ba phyed dang gnyis las lhag pa lhag ma'i dus gzhan la yang yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci so ga'i zla ba phyed dang gnyis las lhag pa lhag ma'i dus gzhan la yang yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it also the case that the remainder of the time, more than one and a half months of spring, is a time when it is permitted to bathe?

original: de'i phyir dbyar rnams kyi dang po las so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyar rnams kyi dang po las so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “from the first month of summer.”

original: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang / dbyar rnams kyi dang po'i zla ba las dus gzhan la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang / dbyar rnams kyi dang po'i zla ba las dus gzhan la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is permitted to bathe at other times, such as the remainder of the spring months, one and a half months, and the first month of summer.

original: zla ba phyed ngang gsum po de dag la tsha ba'i gnyen po'i phyir 'di rjes su gnang ngo //
analyzed: zla ba phyed ngang gsum po de dag la tsha ba'i gnyen po'i phyir 'di rjes su gnang ngo //
translated: These three and a half months are permitted for the purpose of counteracting the heat.

original: de bas na 'dir khas blangs par rnam par gzhag par shes par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir khas blangs par rnam par gzhag par shes par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that this is not a vow that is to be undertaken.

original: ci gnas skabs thams cad du dge slong la de lta bu'i dus kyi tha mar khrus byed pa la ltung byed du 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs thams cad du dge slong la de lta bu'i dus kyi tha mar khrus byed pa la ltung byed du 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Does a monk commit an offense of wrong conduct for bathing at such a time at any time?

original: de'i phyir gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “in the case of obtaining two meals without a robe.”

original: gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa la rnam pa gang yin pa'i dge slong la lhag par gnas te za ba la kha na ma tho ba de lta bu zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa la rnam pa gang yin pa'i dge slong la lhag par gnas te za ba la kha na ma tho ba de lta bu zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: The meaning is: “a monk who is in a state of eating food that is not covered, having obtained a second uncovered meal.”

original: nad pa ma yin pa dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma zhugs pa zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: nad pa ma yin pa dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma zhugs pa zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “not sick, not having done work, not on a journey” is taught here.

original: ci gnas skabs gzhan thams cad la yang bab pa la yang 'dir 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs gzhan thams cad la yang bab pa la yang 'dir 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: In all other circumstances, is it also permissible here?

original: de'i phyir rlung gis ma bskyod pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te //
analyzed: de'i phyir rlung gis ma bskyod pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “not when moved by the wind.”

original: 'dir tshad ji tsam gyis na bskyod pa yin par rig par bya zhe na /🔽de'i phyir gos kyi grva 'gul ba ni de'i mtha' yin @257a * //
analyzed: 'dir tshad ji tsam gyis na bskyod pa yin par rig par bya zhe na / de'i phyir gos kyi grva 'gul ba ni de'i mtha' yin @257a * //
translated: Here, by what measure should it be known as moved?

original: no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the edge of the robe is the limit of that.”

original: 'dir bting ba ni rgyu mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir bting ba ni rgyu mtshan nyid do //
translated: Here, the spread is the very reason.

original: de tsam gyis bsgul ba la ste 'ding ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis bsgul ba la ste 'ding ba ni ma yin no //
translated: By that much, it is moved, but not the spread.

original: gang ji srid ces bya ba 'di la bzung ba ni de'i mtha'o zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: gang ji srid ces bya ba 'di la bzung ba ni de'i mtha'o zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The phrase “as long as” refers to the limit of that.

original: bzhi po 'di rnams las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs thams cad la ci yong par gyur pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi po 'di rnams las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs thams cad la ci yong par gyur pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Do these four states occur in all other circumstances?

original: char gyis ma phog pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: char gyis ma phog pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The root text states, “except when it is raining.”

original: 'dir gang yang rung ba'i chus phog pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir char gyis phog pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gang yang rung ba'i chus phog pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir char gyis phog pa yin no //
translated: In this context, “when it is raining” means when any kind of rain is falling.

original: de ltar yang chu klung rgal ba la sogs pa la dus de nyid du lhag par gnas te khrus bya'i zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang chu klung rgal ba la sogs pa la dus de nyid du lhag par gnas te khrus bya'i zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: Thus, when one is crossing a river, etc., it is permissible to remain in that state for that very occasion in order to bathe.

original: char gyis phog pa 'di'i mtha' gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: char gyis phog pa 'di'i mtha' gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the limit of the time when it is raining?

original: de'i phyir de'i thigs pa gnyis kyis phog pa'o zhes bya pa smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i thigs pa gnyis kyis phog pa'o zhes bya pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “as long as two drops of rain fall on the body.”

original: ci gos la yang yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gos la yang yin nam zhe na /
translated: Does this also apply to clothing?

original: de'i phyir lus la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “on the body.”

original: tha na chu'i thigs pa gnyis sam gsum gyis lus la phog par gyur na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: tha na chu'i thigs pa gnyis sam gsum gyis lus la phog par gyur na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Even if two or three drops of water fall on the body.

original: 'dir bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ni 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ni 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
translated: Here, the method of practice is taught in this way.

original: de bas na 'di ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ma bzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, this is not accepted.

original: 'dir rlung ngang char gyis phog pa'i gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rlung ngang char gyis phog pa'i gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ba yin te /
translated: Here, the perception of another is produced by the touch of the rain of wind.

original: 'dir rlung ni rgyu mtshan can gyi sgrib pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir rlung ni rgyu mtshan can gyi sgrib pa ni /
translated: Here, the wind is the obscuration with a reason.

original: rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin te char gyis 'di la so sor byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin te char gyis 'di la so sor byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not the reason itself, because it is made individually by the rain.

original: char mi bab na skams pa bzhin du gnyen po gos nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'dod par gyur pa'i phyir 'di smos so //
analyzed: char mi bab na skams pa bzhin du gnyen po gos nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'dod par gyur pa'i phyir 'di smos so //
translated: If it does not rain, it is dry, like the antidote itself, because of the desire for it. This is mentioned because of the desire for it.

original: phyir 'dod pa 'di bye brag med par 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: phyir 'dod pa 'di bye brag med par 'byung ba yin te /
translated: This desire arises without distinction.

original: go skabs med par byas pa 'di zhes bya ba ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: go skabs med par byas pa 'di zhes bya ba ma bzung ba'o //
translated: This is not accepted, because it is made without opportunity.

original: gzhan gyi dus su khrus kyi nyin mo ma yin pa zhag bco lnga'i mdun rol du khrus byed na'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dus 'di smos pa de las gzhan pa'i dus la gang zhig bco lnga pa khrus ma yin pa'i zhag smos pa de'i mdun rol
analyzed: gzhan gyi dus su khrus kyi nyin mo ma yin pa zhag bco lnga'i mdun rol du khrus byed na'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dus 'di smos pa de las gzhan pa'i dus la gang zhig bco lnga pa khrus ma yin pa'i zhag smos pa de'i mdun rol
translated: At another time means that one should bathe before the fifteenth day, not on the day of the full moon.

original: du khrus byed pa la ltung byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: du khrus byed pa la ltung byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term is that one should bathe before the fifteenth day, not on the day of the full moon.

original: khrus ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: khrus ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one bathe?

original: de'i phyir dbang bskur bas sam 'jug pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang bskur bas sam 'jug pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “by consecration or by entering.”

original: chus lus kyi chad tsam du byas na khrus yin zhe na /
analyzed: chus lus kyi chad tsam du byas na khrus yin zhe na /
translated: If one bathes by merely wetting the body with water, is that bathing?

original: de'i phyir lte bar son na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lte bar son na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “if it reaches the navel.”

original: de yang dbang bskur bas spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du phyogs gzhan nas rtsom pa yod pa la /
analyzed: de yang dbang bskur bas spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du phyogs gzhan nas rtsom pa yod pa la /
translated: If one begins from the crown of the head and proceeds to the soles of the feet, that is consecration.

original: gal te lte ba'i ltag yan chad 'khru zhing 'og tu ma son pa dang chus 'khru zhing ltag tu ma son pa yang ma chog pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te lte ba'i ltag yan chad 'khru zhing 'og tu ma son pa dang chus 'khru zhing ltag tu ma son pa yang ma chog pa nyid do //
translated: If one bathes above the navel, but not below, or if one bathes with water, but not above, that is not sufficient.

original: @257b gal te de gnyis ka yang dus gcig tu khrus rtsom pa na gal te mnyam du 'jug par gyur na kha na ma tho ba yongs su rdzogs pa gcig gi phyed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @257b gal te de gnyis ka yang dus gcig tu khrus rtsom pa na gal te mnyam du 'jug par gyur na kha na ma tho ba yongs su rdzogs pa gcig gi phyed du 'gyur ro //
translated: If both are bathing at the same time, if they enter the water together, then it is a complete offense for half of it.

original: gal te ma yin na ma chog pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te ma yin na ma chog pa nyid do //
translated: If not, then it is not complete.

original: de bas na gong ma 'am 'og gi cha dag la thams cad du gyur pa nyid ces bya ba 'di la lte bar zhes smos pa ni gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: de bas na gong ma 'am 'og gi cha dag la thams cad du gyur pa nyid ces bya ba 'di la lte bar zhes smos pa ni gtso bo yin te /
translated: Therefore, in the upper or lower parts, it is called complete everywhere. Here, navel is mentioned as the main part.

original: de lta bas na mi srid pa nyid la yang lte ba'i phyogs gtams te rdzogs pa la rdzogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bas na mi srid pa nyid la yang lte ba'i phyogs gtams te rdzogs pa la rdzogs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, even in the impossible, the navel region is filled, and in completion, it is completion.

original: 'dir lte bar ma phyin pa'i mdun rol du ci zhig rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir lte bar ma phyin pa'i mdun rol du ci zhig rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: Here, what should be understood before reaching the navel?

original: de'i phyir mdun rol du ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mdun rol du ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that in front, there is a minor offense.

original: chu la reg pa'i mdun rol du sbyor bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: chu la reg pa'i mdun rol du sbyor bar byed pa ni /
translated: In front of touching the water, the preparation

original: de sbyor ba'i nyes byas su rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de sbyor ba'i nyes byas su rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: is established as the minor offense of preparation.

original: thams cad la dus dag yod kyang byin gyis ma brlabs na zhes bya ba ni dus dag la thams cad du byas pa gang yin pa bslab pa'i gzhi gzhan dang 'brel pa de la dus dag yod du zin kyang byin gyis ma brlabs shing mngon sum du ma
analyzed: thams cad la dus dag yod kyang byin gyis ma brlabs na zhes bya ba ni dus dag la thams cad du byas pa gang yin pa bslab pa'i gzhi gzhan dang 'brel pa de la dus dag yod du zin kyang byin gyis ma brlabs shing mngon sum du ma
translated: Although all have times, if not blessed, means that if the other bases of training are done at all times, then although they have times, if not blessed and not done in actuality,

original: byas na nyes byas so //
analyzed: byas na nyes byas so //
translated: it is a misdeed.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
translated: Here the text is as follows:

original: nyes byas las ldang ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: nyes byas las ldang ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the arising from misdeeds.

original: gang zhig rgyur ba dus kyi gnas skabs sam gzhan de ni dus so //
analyzed: gang zhig rgyur ba dus kyi gnas skabs sam gzhan de ni dus so //
translated: That which is the occasion of the time of the cause or another is time.

original: zhag bco lnga na khrus kyi nyin mo la khrus bya ba gang yin pa de ni grags pa yin pas na 'dir dus med pa'o //
analyzed: zhag bco lnga na khrus kyi nyin mo la khrus bya ba gang yin pa de ni grags pa yin pas na 'dir dus med pa'o //
translated: Since that which is to be bathed on the fifteenth day of the month is well known, here there is no time.

original: 'di ni dus byin gyis brlab par bya ba la yul ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dus byin gyis brlab par bya ba la yul ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as not being the place to bless the time.

original: don gzhan la gzhol bar chu nyams su myong ba ni khrus ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan la gzhol bar chu nyams su myong ba ni khrus ma yin no //
translated: Experiencing water while focused on another object is not bathing.

original: de'i phyir ma bsams par brgal ba dang brgyal ba la gdab pa dag ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni khrus la rtse gcig pa nyid kyi chu nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni khrus gzhan la ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: de'i phyir ma bsams par brgal ba dang brgyal ba la gdab pa dag ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni khrus la rtse gcig pa nyid kyi chu nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni khrus gzhan la ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: The meaning of this passage is that if one experiences the water of a single river, one does not need to do this for other rivers.

original: // 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag chu klung rgal bar byed do zhes gsungs pa dang / 'dir gzhung gzhan las kyang rkyal ba la chus dbang bskur ba dang / zam pa las ltung ba chu klung las rgal bar byed pa dang / chus gang ba la mchod par byed pa la yang ltung ba med do //
analyzed: // 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag chu klung rgal bar byed do zhes gsungs pa dang / 'dir gzhung gzhan las kyang rkyal ba la chus dbang bskur ba dang / zam pa las ltung ba chu klung las rgal bar byed pa dang / chus gang ba la mchod par byed pa la yang ltung ba med do //
translated: Here, the scriptures state that monks should cross rivers, and in other scriptures it states that there is no downfall if one is consecrated with water while swimming, if one crosses a river by jumping from a bridge, or if one makes offerings to the water.

original: de bzhin du mdun rol du 'gro zhing rgya mtsho la gzings nas 'gro ba rnams la bshad ba dang gci ba byed pa yang ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdun rol du 'gro zhing rgya mtsho la gzings nas 'gro ba rnams la bshad ba dang gci ba byed pa yang ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, it is stated that there is no downfall if one urinates or defecates while traveling in a boat on the ocean.

original: de dang de'i ngo bo gzhan gyi rkyen rnams la chu nyams su myong ba la nyes pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'o //🔽ji srid du khrus zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams @258a * //
analyzed: de dang de'i ngo bo gzhan gyi rkyen rnams la chu nyams su myong ba la nyes pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'o // ji srid du khrus zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams @258a * //
translated: There is no fault in experiencing the water in the conditions of this and that.

original: kyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: kyis rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know this as long as it is said, bathing, etc.

original: aa mra pa ran ta'i yul dag la 'di ni 'di med par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aa mra pa ran ta'i yul dag la 'di ni 'di med par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the country of Amrapali, this is known as not having that.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni khrus nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni khrus nges pa'o //
translated: Here, this is the certainty of bathing.

original: 'dir gzung ni go lpags kyi gzhi dag la aa mra ba ran ta'i yul dag tu ni skye bo'i tshigs rnams la rtag tu khrus bya ba rjes su gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzung ni go lpags kyi gzhi dag la aa mra ba ran ta'i yul dag tu ni skye bo'i tshigs rnams la rtag tu khrus bya ba rjes su gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the basis of the skin of the elephant is always permitted for bathing in the country of Amrapali.

original: 'dir yul de nyid dus su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yul de nyid dus su rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, that country should be known as the time.

original: de'i phyir de nyid nye bar bzhag ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid nye bar bzhag ste /
translated: Therefore, having placed that nearby,

original: dus ma yin par yang khrus la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: dus ma yin par yang khrus la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: one should also engage in bathing at the wrong time.

original: cho ga btsan po yod na bag yangs bya ba la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bag yangs su gyur pa'i rtogs pa ni bag yangs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga btsan po yod na bag yangs bya ba la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bag yangs su gyur pa'i rtogs pa ni bag yangs su gyur pa'o //
translated: If there is a powerful rite, one should not rely on the relaxed procedure.

original: cho ga btsan po gzhan yod na bag yangs su bya ba la brten par mi bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga btsan po gzhan yod na bag yangs su bya ba la brten par mi bya'o //
translated: If there is another powerful rite, one should not rely on the relaxed procedure.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo la ji skad du yul mtha' 'khob dag tu 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de la /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo la ji skad du yul mtha' 'khob dag tu 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de la /
translated: Here the text is authoritative: The Blessed One said to the Brahmin girl: “In remote lands, one may receive full ordination with a group of five, including one who holds the Vinaya.”

original: btsun pa gal te bcu'i tshogs mchis bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi na bsnyen par rdzogs zhes bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun pa gal te bcu'i tshogs mchis bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi na bsnyen par rdzogs zhes bgyi'am /
translated: “Venerable, if there is a group of ten, but one receives full ordination with a group of five, including one who holds the Vinaya, is it called full ordination?”

original: nye ba 'khor bsnyen par rdzogs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor bsnyen par rdzogs zhes bya ste /
translated: “Upāli, it is called full ordination.🔽But those who give full ordination are guilty of an offense.”

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dag la 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dag la 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is authoritative.

original: tshig 'di ni cho ga btsan po yod na zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
analyzed: tshig 'di ni cho ga btsan po yod na zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
translated: This is stated with the words “if there is a powerful rite,”

original: rnam par gzhag par byas par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag par byas par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not that it is established.

original: de lta bas na de lta bu'i rigs can la dbang du byed pa nyid ni 'dir ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na de lta bu'i rigs can la dbang du byed pa nyid ni 'dir ro //
translated: Therefore, the subjugation of such a type is allowed here.

original: khrus byed pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: khrus byed pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is “to bathe in a river.”

original: // / ci zhig byas na dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: // / ci zhig byas na dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the downfall of killing an animal?

original: de'i phyir gsod pa'i sems kyis dud 'gro la bsnun na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsod pa'i sems kyis dud 'gro la bsnun na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “If one strikes an animal with the intention to kill.”

original: 'dir gang gi tshe byas pa la gang bskyed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe byas pa la gang bskyed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Here, when is the downfall incurred?

original: de'i phyir gzhi des de'i tshe'am gzhan gyi tshe shina'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhi des de'i tshe'am gzhan gyi tshe shina'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “by that basis, at that time or another time, it dies.”

original: gzhi des zhes bya ba ni gsod pa'i sems kyis bsnun pa'i gzhi des so //
analyzed: gzhi des zhes bya ba ni gsod pa'i sems kyis bsnun pa'i gzhi des so //
translated: By that basis means by the basis of striking with the intention to kill.

original: de'i tshe'am zhes bya ba ni dus de nyid kyi tshe'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe'am zhes bya ba ni dus de nyid kyi tshe'o //
translated: At that time means at that very time.

original: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni bsnun pa'i dus kyi 'og dus gzhan gyi tshe shi na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni bsnun pa'i dus kyi 'og dus gzhan gyi tshe shi na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “At another time” means after the time of the blow, when he dies.

original: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhi des zhes bya ba bye brag tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhi des zhes bya ba bye brag tu bstan pa'o //
translated: “At another time” specifies the basis.

original: de'i tshe'am zhes bya ba 'di la yang rnam par dpyad par bya ba med pas gang zhig 'dir zhu ba las sbyor ba gcig gis byas na yang gsod par bya ba ji snyed pa re re la ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe'am zhes bya ba 'di la yang rnam par dpyad par bya ba med pas gang zhig 'dir zhu ba las sbyor ba gcig gis byas na yang gsod par bya ba ji snyed pa re re la ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro //
translated: Since there is no analysis in “at that time,” if one act of application is made here, then there is one offense of wrongdoing for each being to be killed.

original: sems @258b can re re de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba 'dis de bsdus par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems @258b can re re de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba 'dis de bsdus par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Each sentient being connected with that” should be understood to include that.

original: lus de dang 'brel pa ni tha mi dang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad 'dir gsod pa'i pham par 'gyur ba la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus de dang 'brel pa ni tha mi dang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad 'dir gsod pa'i pham par 'gyur ba la rig par bya'o //
translated: “Connected with that body” means not different bodies. All of this should be understood as the defeat of killing.

original: sems can gyi gzugs sems can ma yin pa la ni nyes byas byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba kha cig las shing las byas pa 'am sa las byas pa'i gzugs la bsnun na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can gyi gzugs sems can ma yin pa la ni nyes byas byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba kha cig las shing las byas pa 'am sa las byas pa'i gzugs la bsnun na nyes byas so zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: “If one strikes a form made of wood or clay, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: 'di ni rig par ma gyur par shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rig par ma gyur par shes par mi bya'o //
translated: This should not be understood as referring to an unconscious act.

original: sems can gyi 'du shes dang 'brel pa'i 'du shes la 'dir dngos po las yod par gyur pa nyid kyis dud 'gro'i rnam par nyid la ni 'dir gtogs ba'i kha na ma tho bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes dang 'brel pa'i 'du shes la 'dir dngos po las yod par gyur pa nyid kyis dud 'gro'i rnam par nyid la ni 'dir gtogs ba'i kha na ma tho bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the offense is to be known as a natural offense, not a proscribed offense, because the thought of a sentient being is connected with the thought of killing.

original: gzhan gyi rnam pa nyid la ni mi gsod pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rnam pa nyid la ni mi gsod pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: But if the form is not that of a sentient being, then the offense is connected with killing.

original: dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The twelfth downfall is a downfall of killing an animal.

original: // / ci zhig rjes su sgrub na 'gyod pa bskyed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: // / ci zhig rjes su sgrub na 'gyod pa bskyed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the downfall of regretting what one has accomplished?

original: de'i phyir khyod bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma yin zhing pham par 'gyur ba byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dge slong ma yin pa'i don gyis 'gyod pa bskyed na'o zhes bya ba smos te zhes bya ba la sogs pa dge slong ma yin pa nyid du
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma yin zhing pham par 'gyur ba byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dge slong ma yin pa'i don gyis 'gyod pa bskyed na'o zhes bya ba smos te zhes bya ba la sogs pa dge slong ma yin pa nyid du
translated: Therefore, it is said, “if you generate regret with the meaning of not being a fully ordained monk, saying, ‘Therefore, you are not fully ordained and have committed a defeating offense,’ and so on.”

original: ji srid bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gsal bar byed cing dge slong ma yin pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa de rnam par rig pa'i rdzas de thams cad kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong gi tshul ga la yod de
analyzed: ji srid bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gsal bar byed cing dge slong ma yin pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa de rnam par rig pa'i rdzas de thams cad kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong gi tshul ga la yod de
translated: As long as you clarify the state of being fully ordained, and clarify not being a fully ordained monk, how can you, Venerable One, have the way of a fully ordained monk with all those substances of consciousness?

original: bram ze nyid kyang ga la yod /
analyzed: bram ze nyid kyang ga la yod /
translated: How can you have the status of a Brahmin?

original: tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze rab tu byung ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze rab tu byung ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Venerable One, you are a Brahmin who went forth,” and so on. This is the meaning.

original: 'dir dgos pa ni rigs dmigs kyis bsal ba la rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dgos pa ni rigs dmigs kyis bsal ba la rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the purpose is to be understood as the exclusion of the specific class.

original: mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas go bar mi byed cing de kha na ma tho ba nyams pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gnyis ka'i bsam pa nyid la gnyis ka zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas go bar mi byed cing de kha na ma tho ba nyams pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gnyis ka'i bsam pa nyid la gnyis ka zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One should not understand both to mean both the one who is reproved and the one who reproves, but rather the intention of the one who reproves, which is to speak about the faults of others, and the intention of the one who is reproved, which is to be ashamed of his faults.

original: su la 'gyod pa bskyed ce na /
analyzed: su la 'gyod pa bskyed ce na /
translated: With regard to the question, To whom is remorse generated?

original: de'i phyir dge slong la'o zhes bya ba smos so //
